text: Bellingwedde is a former municipality in the province of Groningen, the Netherlands. == History == Bellingwedde was created on 1 September 1968 from the former municipalities of Bellingwolde and Wedde. Since 2018, it has been part of the new municipality of Westerwolde. title: Bellingwedde
